creator: apache@netaction.de
text:
With "MaxClients 10" I can load after a restart one website. Then the error
appears in error.log and no second site is possible to get. If I set "MaxClients
100" everything works fine, but this can't be the real reason.

In many forums people reportet the same bug without any solution.

I have 100% Debian etch.

MaxClients applies to the entire server, not one VirtualHost (web site).

So it's entirely likely you have more than 10 simultaneous requests to
the entire server.  Note most browsers today create two pipelines, eating
up two request pipelines at a time.

For future user support issues, see the users@httpd mailing list instead 
of the bugzilla bug tracking forum, which is only for errors in the code.
